skipText:

But it would affect your plant growth

parameters.text:
I am going to ask for permission to read your call log 

Requesting permission...

Good work!
There are lot of things your call app can do: 

Tap on Continue button
You can see and navigate throuh FAVOURITES, RECENT CALLS, VOICEMAIL, and CONTACTS from the Call app
I will open the app for you just go through and comeback to lesson
